text: Maya Diab ( ; born 12 November 1980) is a Lebanese pop singer, entertainer, actress and television personality. She is a former member of the Lebanese girl group The 4 Cats.http://www.lahamag.com/Details/50066/فيدو-من-الذاكرة- شاهدوا-مايا-دياب-ونيكول-سابا-في-بداياتهما-مع-فرقة-4-cats ==Biography== Maya Diab was born in Achrafieh, to a Christian Greek Orthodox family. Diab majored in radio and TV media after receiving her university degree from the Lebanese University; she worked on several TV programs. Diab has one brother (Ghassan) and two sisters (Mona and Grace). She is the youngest of her parents’ children. She married a Muslim businessman, Abbas Nasser, in 2006 with whom she had her daughter, Kai, the couple separated in 2017. In January 2020, she mentioned that she was kidnapped in Beirut in 2005, where she was held hostage and abused in a car for one day. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== * #MyMaya (2015) ===Singles=== * "Habibi" * "Chaklak Mabta'rif" * "Tawel Balak" * "Dabou Inayk" * "Aywah" * "Ya Gatifeen" * "Hiya Di Donia" ==Filmography== * 2007 – "Asad W Arbaa Kotat" () ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Lebanese female singers Category:Lebanese film actresses Category:Lebanese pop singers Category:Musicians from Beirut Category:Lebanese Christians Category:Lebanese Maronites Category:Lebanese University alumni Category:21st-century women singers Category:Singers who perform in Egyptian Arabic Category:Actresses from Beirut
title: Maya Diab
